// for preferences Display tutorial Display the tutorial to learn how to use the app
// for tutorial/showcase Promo Grid Tutorial Promo Grid Hints First, add people using the Add People button. Next, establish ratings for each one using the Evaluate People button. Finally, see which ones are ready for promotion using the See Results button. When this tutorial is over, it will be toggled off. Use the options menu to turn it back on. Add people using the New button here. A screen will be presented allowing you to enter basic info for that person. You can evaluate them one at a time using the check box icon on this screen, or return to the main menu and use the Evaluate People button to go through them all. Next Got It
